Package data

Class Data

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Data
  • public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the entire set of transaction retrived from db

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Data​(java.lang.String table)
      Builds an object instance of Data class which summarizes the entire data set (recovered from the db)

      Returns the attribute expressed by an index

      Returns the attribute value in the position expressed by [exampleIndex,exampleIndex]
      Tuple getItemSet​(int index)
      Creates and returns an instance object of class Tuple that models the i-th row given as a sequence of Attribute-value pairs.

      Returns the number if attributes in the data set

      Returns the number of rows in the data set (transactons retrived from a table db)

      Returns the data set as string

    • Constructor Detail

      • Data

        public Data​(java.lang.String table)
     throws NoValueException,
            DatabaseConnectionException,
            java.sql.SQLException,
            EmptyDatasetException
        Builds an object instance of Data class which summarizes the entire data set (recovered from the db)
        Parameters:
        table - name of table stored in db which contains data
        Throws:
        NoValueException - thrown when there are no value retrived from column in db when it's used aggregate operator
        DatabaseConnectionException - thrown when the connection to the db fails.
        java.sql.SQLException - if there are some problems with the connection to db
        EmptyDatasetException - thrown there are no transaction retrived from db
